data.name: GF1B_PMS_E120.9_N28.0_20230130_L1A1228249417-MUX
data.cap: Aerial view of a coastal city with a river and surrounding farmland.
data.caption: This satellite image shows a coastal city with a river running through it, surrounded by farmland and mountains. The city is densely populated, with many buildings and roads visible. The river is wide and has a few islands in it. The surrounding farmland is mostly green, indicating that it is being used for agriculture. The mountains in the background are rugged and rocky, with some snow on the peaks. Overall, this image provides a detailed view of the city and its surroundings, highlighting the contrast between the urban and natural environments.

data.cap: Satellite image of a coastal area with a river delta, showing a mix of land use and land cover types.
data.caption: This satellite image shows a coastal area with a river delta, featuring a mix of land use and land cover types. The image reveals a complex network of waterways, including rivers, streams, and lakes, which are surrounded by a variety of land use types such as farmland, residential areas, and industrial zones. The land cover types include vegetation, bare ground, and water, with some areas showing signs of human activity such as roads and buildings. The image also shows some natural features such as woodlands and mountains in the background.
